REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0189 reute b f BC-CORRECTION---BUNDESBA 04-26 0048
REUTERS.TEXT: CORRECTION - BUNDESBANK INTERVENES IN TOKYO In the Tokyo item "/BUNDESBANK INTERVENES IN TOKYO VIA BANK OF JAPAN," please read in the second para: "Dealers' estimates of the intervention amount varied from 10 mln to 100 mln dlrs." Corrects figures from 100 mln to one billion dlrs. REUTER
